section.name: Unit 5:​ Course Conclusion
section.summary:
Welcome to Unit 5: Course Conclusion

In this course we have covered the why, how, and what of integrating technology into the adult education classroom. You have learned about:​

  • using research-based strategies to ensure that the focus is on learning rather than tech for its own sake;​
  • the importance of digital inclusion and digital resilience for your students and yourself;​
  • using the POST Method to consider people, objectives, and strategy before considering what technology to use; and ​
  • the Digital Skills Library, a resource that can aid you when you are considering which digital literacy skills to cover and identifying which technology tools to use to support the instruction.

Select the Unit 5 link below to begin the culminating activities for the course.

You will find handouts linked to the lessons in the unit. You can also find all Unit 5 handouts here on the main course page; please see below.​
